member.name: MF_TIMED_TEXT_DISPLAY_ALIGNMENT
member.summary: Specifies how text is aligned with the display.

member.name: MF_TIMED_TEXT_DISPLAY_ALIGNMENT.MF_TIMED_TEXT_DISPLAY_ALIGNMENT_BEFORE
member.summary: Text is aligned before an element.

member.name: MF_TIMED_TEXT_DISPLAY_ALIGNMENT.MF_TIMED_TEXT_DISPLAY_ALIGNMENT_AFTER
member.summary: Text is aligned after an element.

member.name: MF_TIMED_TEXT_DISPLAY_ALIGNMENT.MF_TIMED_TEXT_DISPLAY_ALIGNMENT_CENTER
member.summary: Text is aligned in the center between elements.
